message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you at $160. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $160 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $160 is my initial asking price, I'd be willing to come down a bit. How about we meet halfway at $130?
I appreciate the compromise, but $130 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
